title: 9/11 Attacks
description: Coordinated terrorist attacks in the USA.

title: Lehman Brothers Collapse
description: Start of the global financial crisis.

title: COVID-19 Declared Pandemic
description: WHO declares COVID-19 a global pandemic.

title: Fall of Berlin Wall
description: The Berlin Wall falls, symbolizing the end of the Cold War.

description: UK hands over Hong Kong to China.

description: Failed military coup attempt in Turkey.

description: Tunisian street vendor's self-immolation sparks Arab Spring.

description: The Soviet Union officially ceases to exist.

title: Indian Ocean Tsunami
description: Massive tsunami kills over 230,000 people in 14 countries.
